insert into t_grading_info (id, grading_id, traffic_describe, university, school, kindergarten, mall, post_office, bank, hospital, other, tel, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trafficDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kindergarten,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_grading_info set grading_id = #{gradingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, traffic_describe = #{trafficDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, university = #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kindergarten = #{kindergarten,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mall = #{mall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_office = #{postOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.grading_id as t_grading_id, t.traffic_describe as t_traffic_describe, t.university as t_university, t.school as t_school, t.kindergarten as t_kindergarten, t.mall as t_mall, t.post_office as t_post_office, t.bank as t_bank, t.hospital as t_hospital, t.other as t_other, t.tel as t_tel, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading_info t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t.id as t_id, t.grading_id as t_grading_id, t.traffic_describe as t_traffic_describe, t.university as t_university, t.school as t_school, t.kindergarten as t_kindergarten, t.mall as t_mall, t.post_office as t_post_office, t.bank as t_bank, t.hospital as t_hospital, t.other as t_other, t.tel as t_tel, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_grading_info t
